metadata.title: Quantum Nexus LNK | Quantum-Inspired Digital Solutions
metadata.description: Building technology platforms that connect communities with cutting-edge digital services. From group buying to emergency coordination, we deliver bilingual solutions on Vercel and Supabase.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Thoughts, tutorials, and insights on technology and development.

hero.title: Scaling community-driven innovation with purposeful technology.
hero.lead: We design, build, and operate multilingual digital experiences that connect people, amplify collective action, and unlock the next era of intelligent services.

about.title: Our Mission
about.paragraph1: Quantum Nexus LNK Limited Liability Co. builds technology platforms that turn complex community challenges into actionable solutions. From group buying ecosystems to emergency resource coordination, our work connects people with the tools they need to thrive.
about.paragraph2: We combine human-centered design with quantum-inspired algorithms to uncover patterns, optimize decisions, and deliver measurable impact.

services.title: What We Build
services.service1Desc: Building responsive, scalable websites and web applications for small businesses using Vue, React, and Next.js. Deployed on Vercel, Supabase, and Firestore with optimized performance and user experience.
services.service2Desc: Dockerized applications hosted on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). From side projects to emergency response systems with complex permission controls, we ensure reliable, secure, and scalable deployments.
services.service3Desc: Advancing capabilities in fine-tuning, deploying, and integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) locally and in production environments. Building intelligent systems that enhance decision-making and automation.

platforms.title: Tech Stack & Infrastructure
platforms.paragraph1: We leverage modern cloud platforms and frameworks: Vercel, Supabase, Firestore, and Google Cloud Platform. Our expertise spans Vue, React, and Next.js, delivering fast, scalable, and maintainable solutions.
platforms.paragraph2: Containerization with Docker ensures consistent deployments. From simple landing pages to complex emergency coordination systems with advanced permission controls, we build with reliability and security at the core.
platforms.item1: Frontend: Vue, React, Next.js with TypeScript
platforms.item3: DevOps: Docker, GCP deployment, CI/CD pipelines
platforms.item4: Emerging: LLM fine-tuning, local AI deployment

portfolio.title: Selected Work
portfolio.intro: Building impactful solutions that address real-world challenges across communities and individuals.

submange.title: Submange
submange.desc: Subscription management and group buying platform that transforms collective purchasing into seamless experiences.

costcoGroup.title: Costco Group Buying Platform
costcoGroup.desc: Facilitating collaborative shopping experiences, enabling communities to access bulk purchasing benefits together.

emergencyTW.title: Taiwan Emergency Resource Integration
emergencyTW.desc: Comprehensive disaster relief coordination platform with advanced permission controls, deployed on GCP for reliable emergency response.

teletherapy.title: Teletherapy Integration Platform
teletherapy.desc: Video counseling platform with AI-powered case note organization, therapist blogs, and supervision matchmaking. Empowering mental health professionals with intelligent tools.

adhdCompanion.title: ADHD Task Companion
adhdCompanion.desc: Gamified task management app using AI to break down complex tasks, track progress, and reward completion through a nurturing virtual pet system.

contact.title: Let's Build Together
contact.paragraph: Ready to activate your next digital initiative? We partner with founders, civic leaders, and innovators to design solutions that scale across languages, devices, and markets.
contact.ctaText: We are cultivating strategic partnerships in quantum-inspired technology, collective intelligence, and community tooling. Reach out to co-create pilot programs or accelerate transformation.

footer.tagline: Building quantum-inspired solutions that empower communities.

company.name: Quantum Nexus LNK Limited Liability Co.

comments.title: Comments
comments.noComments: Be the first to leave a comment!
comments.errorLoading: Failed to load comments. Please try again.
comments.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
comments.errorTooLong: Your comment is too long. Please shorten it.
comments.successPending: Your comment has been submitted and is awaiting moderation.
comments.loginRequired: Please sign in to leave a comment.
comments.recaptchaMisconfigured: reCAPTCHA is enabled but not properly configured. Your comment may require manual approval.

common.roleMismatchMessage: You entered via environment fallback, but your database role is not synced. Some operations may be denied by RLS. Please contact the Owner to add you to the site_admins table.

theme.title: Theme Settings
theme.description: Configure global theme, fonts, and appearances across the site.
theme.ownerOnlyDesc: You can view current settings, but only Owner can change and save.

pages.description: Configure themes for specific page sections.

layouts.title: Layout Settings
layouts.description: Customize tokens for each layout type (colors, radius, shadows, etc.)

fonts.title: Font Settings
fonts.description: Switch global font stacks (system fonts only). Only Owner can change these settings.

fonts.customValue: Current value is custom (not in allowlist)
fonts.preview: Preview: Quantum Nexus / 你好世界
fonts.bodySample: Body sample text with numbers 1234 and symbols (.,:;).
fonts.customWarning: The current --theme-font value is not in the allowlist. Choose an allowlisted font or reset to preset.

preview.title: Theme Preview
preview.blockedDesc: Browser blocked the preview. Please open the preview in a new tab.

tokens.derivedTokensDesc: These values are typically derived from base tokens, but you can override them.

theme.surfaceCardDesc: Raised from background with subtle depth
theme.typographyBody: Body text renders in the selected font stack. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

blog.title: Posts
blog.subtitle: Manage your blog posts
blog.noPostsDesc: Get started by creating your first blog post.

postForm.hint: Hint: Fill in title and content for at least one language. Fill both to reach visitors in both languages.

en.contentPlaceholder: Write your post content in Markdown...
en.coverImageAltPlaceholder: Describe the image for SEO and accessibility
en.coverImageAltHint: Recommended for SEO and screen readers
en.markdownHint: Supports: **bold**, *italic*, `code`, ```code blocks```, math formulas ($...$ or $$...$$), images, tables

zh.coverImageAltHint: 建議填寫以提升搜尋引擎優化和螢幕閱讀器體驗

postForm.slugHint: Used in post URL, English recommended
postForm.readingTimeHint: Leave empty to auto-calculate on frontend

validation.requireContent: Please fill in title and content for at least one language

controlCenter.title: Control Center
controlCenter.description: Search across your content using semantic similarity, keyword matching, or a hybrid approach.
controlCenter.notAvailableDesc: No embeddings have been generated yet. Embeddings are created when content is added and the embedding queue is processed.
controlCenter.notAvailableHint: Ensure the OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable is set and the embedding Edge Function is deployed.
controlCenter.noResults: No results found. Try a different query or adjust filters.
controlCenter.enterQuery: Enter a search query to find similar content
controlCenter.minChars: Enter at least {min} characters to search

modeDescriptions.keyword: Find content with matching text (exact terms)
modeDescriptions.hybrid: Combine semantic and keyword search with weights

analytics.title: Search Analytics
analytics.lowQualityHint: Click a query to search again. Consider adding more content or adjusting embeddings for these topics.

hybrid.adjustHint: Adjust the balance between semantic (meaning) and keyword (exact match) search.

embeddings.title: Embeddings Management
embeddings.description: Manage vector embeddings for semantic search and similarity features.
embeddings.notAvailableDesc: No embeddings have been generated yet. Use the "Initialize All" button below to scan content and enqueue embedding generation.
embeddings.ensureApiKey: Ensure the OPENAI_API_KEY is set in Supabase secrets and the embedding Edge Function is deployed.
embeddings.clickLoadMetrics: Click "Load Metrics" to view quality scoring results from LLM-as-a-Judge.
embeddings.initConfirm: This will scan all content and enqueue items without embeddings. Continue?
embeddings.embeddingNote: Embedding generation requires the Edge Function to be deployed and queued items are processed by the embedding queue worker.

common.ownerOnly: Import is restricted to owners only.

preprocessing.subtitle: Monitor queue status, throughput, and quality metrics

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.notConfiguredDesc: To use AI analysis, set the OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable in your deployment settings.
aiAnalysis.cronNotConfiguredDesc: Reports will not be processed automatically. Set CRON_SECRET in your environment and configure Vercel Cron.
aiAnalysis.standardDesc: Send all filtered data to AI
aiAnalysis.ragTip: RAG mode uses semantic search to find the most relevant data, potentially reducing cost.
aiAnalysis.modelCostNote: Estimated cost varies by data size. Higher-tier models provide more detailed analysis.
aiAnalysis.costWarningDesc: has higher pricing. Estimated cost depends on data size. Consider using a more economical model for routine analyses.
aiAnalysis.analysisStarted: Analysis started! It will appear in the list when complete.
aiAnalysis.memberFilter: Analysis will target this specific user
aiAnalysis.userNotFound: user not found in customer profiles
